user_description.ru: Ты плюёшь ей в рот или на лицо.
user_description.en: You spit in her mouth or on her face. She accepts with open lips.

ai_description.ru: Он плюёт ей в рот, она принимает с открытыми губами. Грубо, унизительно, но она хочет этого. Слюна как знак власти.
ai_description.en: He spits in her mouth, she accepts with open lips. Rough, degrading, but she wants it. Saliva as a sign of power.

image_prompt: man close to woman face, he spitting, she looking up with open mouth, both partially clothed, bedroom setting
